readable.title: 2987121689_f9de6c479b
readable.content: A man in a white sports uniform tries to fend off another player in a black and yellow uniform while the ball floats in midair . Two soccer opponents run and fight for the soocerball on a grassy field . Two soccer players are going after the ball . Two soccer players battle for the ball during an intense match . Two young men on opposing soccer teams are competing to get the ball on a soccer field .
